title: Forget Free Coffee. What Matters Is if Workers Feel Returning Is Worth It.
description: Commutes are still painful, readers say. And itâ€™s hard to give up the joys of working from home. But many of those who have gone back to the office say they like it.
dc:creator: Hanna Ingber
media:credit: Tony Luong for The New York Times
media:description: Tim Hirzel works from home in Quincy, Mass., most days, but commutes to Boston about one day a week.
